Part 1:
my max int = 2147483647, tabulated = 2147483647
my min int = -2147483648, tabulated = -2147483648
Part 2:
double machine e = 2.22044604925031E-16, 2^-52 = 2.22044604925031E-16
float machine e = 1.192093E-07, 2^-23 = 1.19209289550781E-07
Part 3:
sumA-1 = 0.000000e+000 should be 1.110223e-010
sumB-1 = 1.110223e-010 should be 1.110223e-010
Part 4:
d1=7.999999999999999e-001
d2=8.000000000000000e-001
d1==d2 ? => False
Comparing doubles: task
d1=7.999999999999999e-001
d2=8.000000000000000e-001
d1==d2 ? => True
